titles.title: To amend title 23, United States Code, with respect to United States Route 78 in Mississippi, and for other purposes.
To amend title 23, United States Code, with respect to United States Route 78 in Mississippi, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary: Permits the continued operation of trucks on any segment of U.S. Route 78 in Mississippi designated as a route on the Interstate System. Prohibits federal weight limitation requirements from applying to those trucks that could operate legally on such segment before that designation.
